When people need to get packages, cargo or freight within India, ZippY is the company that can provide the reliable shipping services you need. For individuals, this can include your purchases made on the Internet using our online shopping services and assistance, or your personal belongings if you are moving to or from One Happy Island. For businesses, we provide a full range of cargo services, including freight forwarding by air or sea, shipping project logistics planning and execution, warehousing and distribution solutions, customs clearance and documentation, and general courier and delivery services. Your order moves us and we look forward to providing you with excellent customer service that exceeds your expectations!

How it Works?
The Zippy platform is hassle free and simple to use!







1.Login

New on Zippy need to Singin/Login on www.zippy.com







2.Create Shipment

You need to create your shipment and fill its details.







3.Pickup/Delivery

Our Delivery agent will come to your location for picking up the shipment.







4.Track

You can track your shipment on www.zippy.com



); }; export default Home;
